scripts.installPackages: cd runtime/ && pnpm install && cd .. && cd react/ && pnpm install && cd .. && cd jsx-runtime/ && pnpm install && cd .. && cd testServer/ && pnpm install && cd ..
scripts.buildPackages: cd runtime/ && npm run build && cd .. && cd react/ && npm run build && cd .. && cd jsx-runtime/ && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.linkRuntime: cd runtime/ && pnpm link --global && cd .. && cd testServer/ && pnpm link --global @xrsdk/runtime && cd .. && cd react/ && pnpm link --global @xrsdk/runtime
scripts.linkReact: cd react/ && pnpm link --global && cd .. && cd testServer/ && pnpm link --global @xrsdk/react && cd .. && cd jsx-runtime/ && pnpm link --global @xrsdk/react
scripts.setup: npm run installPackages && npm run buildPackages && npm run linkRuntime && npm run linkReact
scripts.watchNPM: concurrently "cd runtime/ && npm run start" "cd react/ && npm run start"
